name: Flappy Doge - Cryptocurrency Game
description:
Flappy Doge is a Flappy Bird inspired game where you play as a doge, collect cryptocurrency, and buy upgrades!

How to Play:

  • Tap the screen to flap
  • Avoid the pipes so you don't die
  • Earn steak multipliers by collecting every doge!
  • Increase passive income the longer you play

To be added: Buy upgrades and increase earnings

Disclaimer: This is just a game, none of the DOGE you earn is real.

Join the community and provide feedback, bug reports, or just chat:

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/nF2MbxsQ

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/flappy_doge
